name: 15PCS Mini Stainless Steel Wire Brush Set, Curved Handle Masonry Brushes, Wire Bristle Scratch Brush for Cleaning Welding Slag, Rust, Paint, Metal, Wood, Rust Remover Tool
short_description: Durable Stainless Steel Wire Brushes: This 15PCS stainless steel wire brush set is made of high-quality stainless steel bristles and strong plastic handles, ensuring long-lasting durability for heavy-duty cleaning and rust removal tasks.

Efficient Rust and Paint Removal: Perfect for cleaning welding slag, rust, corrosion, paint, and dirt from metal, wood, machinery, and automotive parts without damaging surfaces or fine details. Ideal for both household and industrial use.

Ergonomic Curved Handle Design: The curved handle and anti-slip grip fit comfortably in your hand, reducing fatigue during long cleaning sessions. The toothbrush-style design helps you reach narrow or hard-to-access areas easily.

Multi-Purpose Cleaning Tool: These stainless steel wire brushes work great for descaling metal parts, polishing unfinished surfaces, removing rust from tools, and cleaning grout, tiles, door frames, and other small crevices.
Easy to Store and Organize: Each wire brush features a small hanging hole at the handle’s end, making it convenient to hang, store, and save space in your workshop or toolbox.
product_description: This 15PCS stainless steel wire brush set is perfect for cleaning rust, welding slag, paint, and corrosion on metal, wood, and machinery surfaces. The durable wire bristles remove tough dirt without scratching, while the curved handle provides a comfortable, non-slip grip. Ideal for automotive, workshop, and household cleaning tasks, helping you reach tight areas with ease and efficiency. name: NEIKO 00325A Wire Brush Drill Attachments with 1/4-Inch Hex Shank, SAE and MM Brushes Assortment, Mountable on Power Drill or Die Grinder, 38-Piece Set
short_description: DRILL WIRE-BRUSH SET: Our set includes a variety of small wire brushes for cleaning rust, dirt, and corrosion from battery-terminal clamps, light sockets, and more. The 1/4-inch hex allows these brushes to be mounted on a power drill or die grinder.

HEAVY-DUTY ERGONOMIC BRUSHES: The soft handle makes it easy to use our top-quality wire brushes without a power drill. These brushes provide a comfortable grip to help reduce hand fatigue, making them perfect for long cleaning sessions.

LONG REACH BAR: This kit’s 6-inch quick-release handle makes an ideal extension piece to add to your reach. It’s perfect for accessing small, tight spaces or narrow gaps, so you can thoroughly clean even the most hard-to-reach parts.

INCLUDED DRILL ACCESSORIES: Our set includes one 6-inch handle and 12 heads for each type of brush: stainless steel, brass, and nylon. The standard (SAE) brush sizes are from 5/16" to 3/4", and the metric (MM) brush sizes range from 8 mm to 19 mm.

CONVENIENT STORAGE: Sturdy and precise, this 38-piece kit comes in a blow-molded plastic case for easy storage and travel. Ideal for automotive or electrical work, it’s a useful addition to home or professional tool collections.
product_description: The NEIKO 38-piece wire brush drill-attachments set gives you extra power and cleaning precision when you need to get rid of built-up grease, remove a bead-sealing area on oxidized aluminum rims, and more. Ideal for cleaning rust, corrosion, and dirt, these wire brush drill attachments are made from 3 different materials: stainless steel, brass, and nylon. Each small wire brush measures 4" long with a 2-inch brush and 2-inch shank. This kit comes with a 1/4-inch hex shank that mounts the brushes on a power drill or die grinder. The included quick-release 6-inch extension bar with a soft ergonomic handle also allows you to use the brushes by hand and helps you reach small, tight spaces. This set of brushes and tools includes 12 stainless-steel wire brush heads, 12 brass brushes, 12 nylon brushes, a 1/4-inch hex shank, and a 6-inch extension bar. The brushes include the following sizes for SAE: 5/16", 11/32", 13/32", 7/16", 15/32", 1/2", 9/16", 5/8", 11/16", 23/32", and 3/4". The brushes include the following sizes for MM: 8 mm, 9 mm, 10 mm, 11 mm, 12 mm, 13 mm, 14 mm, 15 mm, 16 mm, 17 mm, 18 mm, and 19 mm. Our drill-brush set comes in a blow-molded hard plastic storage case for optimal organization. This set is ideal for industrial cleaning, home use, hobby or DIY projects, and use on the jobsite. When it comes to drill attachments and more, NEIKO has your back with our durable, dependable, and strong tools.
